Set the real-time data interval

1 Click the Configuration Parameters button .

Or, on the Template menu, click Configuration Parameters and then click Intervals and Shifts.

2 In the Real-Time Data Interval box, select an interval. To set a custom interval, click the Other check box and enter an interval.

Recommended intervals:

ICU: 10–30 minutes

OR: 2–5 minutes

3 When you are finished setting time-related parameters, click Close.
